report_page.hero_text: Hi %{firstName}, great to see you again. Your teams have completed their training – their perspective about your data & AI transformation is very interesting, we have gained a lot of insights! Let’s look at the big picture first, before exploring how you could tackle roadblocks with AI or implement innovation ideas from your team.

engagement_description.50_and_above: %{percentage}% of your people have completed the core training – great engagement! ​
engagement_description.0_to_50: %{percentage}% of your people have completed the core training – let’s push them.

executive_summary.key_insights_description: Interesting insights from your team: There are %{count} key roadblocks that slow down or hinder progress on data & AI.
executive_summary.speed_of_transforamtion_description: From analysing of your key people’s input, we estimate your speed of transformation as %{speed} compared to the rest of the company. With new rounds we can also compare your speed over time.

recommendations_generated_description.0: You have not yet crafted any suggested actions to address the revealed issues that seems to slow down or hinder transformation progress. Time to pull up your sleeves?
recommendations_generated_description.above_0: You have crafted %{count} suggested actions to address the revealed issues that seems to slow down or hinder transformation progress. Good job, this can move the needle!

executive_summary.ideas_reviewed_description: Your teams have developed %{count} concrete data or AI use case ideas, ready for you to review. Ready to create impact?

scores_and_kpis.intro_text: %{firstName}, let’s first have a look where you stand in your transformation. We measure transformation along 3 academically grounded criteria: the readiness of your people, the guidance you provide, and how well you execute on the transformation. We have learned a lot from your employees, identified patterns, and listened to individual opinions. Please go through the information – this forms the basis to prioritize efforts and develop actions to take away roadblocks with data & AI.

focus_area.intro_text: This section offers a comprehensive view of your transformation metrics, %{firstName}. Here you'll find what your employees know, think, and feel about key transformation issues. Take your time to absorb this information – it's crucial for understanding your organization's current state and potential future directions.

innovation_ideas.intro_text: Good ideas can come from the most unexpected places. As part of their training, your people combined their domain knowledge, experience and new learnings, with a powerful idea creation process, to come up with data-driven use case ideas. As you explore the ideas, rate them for easy overersight of which ones you find most promising. Ready to dive in to see if there are any new exciting opportunities contributed by your people?

kpi_deep_dive_popup.score_and_comparison_text:
To put your score into context, you can compare it with up to 4 benchmarks, like the industry average or your company average. Also, have a look how your score has developed over time.

The range of the score indicates the variance of it – the larger, the higher the spread in the opinion of your teams.
